## **Introduction**

```{r, eval=T, include=T, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
library(covid19.analytics)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, eval=T, include=T, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
covid_df <- covid19.analytics::covid19.data()
```


```{r, eval=T, include=T, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
covid_df %>% 
  filter(Country_Region == "Brazil",
         Province_State == "Alagoas") %>% 
  head()
```
